frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.content: No matter if it's a static website or an interactive web application, my experience in front-end development allows me to offer tailor-made and high-performance solutions. With my expertise and commitment to innovative solutions, I can help you take your online presence to the next level.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.content: Developing full-stack and back-end applications is also part of my portfolio. This allows for the creation of important back-end structures for communication or server-side applications.

mobile.title: Mobile App Development
mobile.content: I offer professional mobile app development for iOS and Android, based on React Native, Flutter, or Ionic. My skills include using these frameworks to develop cross-platform apps, as well as collaborating with you to create an engaging user experience.

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.content: <0>I am a 23-year-old software developer from Leipzig, and I have been working in this field for seven years. For the past four years, I have been offering my services as a software developer. I specialize in developing high-performance applications in the web and mobile domains and have extensive experience working with various programming languages and frameworks. As a young person, I am very passionate and dedicated in my profession and approach every challenge with enthusiasm.</0><1>I am capable of developing innovative and customized solutions for my clients that can optimize their business processes and advance their company. I value working collaboratively with my clients and work closely with them to understand and fulfill their requirements and goals. If you are looking for a competent and experienced software developer who is ready to work with you to find the best possible solution for your company, then I am the right partner for you. Please feel free to contact me to learn more about how I can help you.</1>
